title: Creating Replay Links in Post (?)
body:
I have several replays of some bugs i encountered. How do I post/link them into a discussion?
I'd like for players and RIOT to see them.

replies.body: Thanks for assisting our QA team!  Per the replays guide, you should be able to turn them into highlights then upload them to an external site, and post the link in your post.  If you run into any issues, screenshots and clear steps will be fine.  Make sure to post it over at the [bug boards ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report)so QA can take a look.
